Table support: yes-noTable support added in FictionBook V2.1. Not supported in V2.0
yesSupported in all except 1st Generation Kindle. (Support level is as it is in mobipocket)
Sound support: yesSupported only in kindle for iPhone, iPod, iPad.

Word wrap support: yes-no"Reflow" is implemented by some readers.
yes-noPostScript programs may implement word wrap, this depends on if the writer of the .ps file implemented it. Word wrap is not a built-in feature of PostScript.
